title: Canonical Governance Stage Definitions
description: Defines the canonical stage identifiers (S-IDs) used throughout the Sovereign AGI pipeline, providing a single source of truth for audit logging and subsystem referencing.

stages.description: Mapping of Stage ID to its canonical name and operational description.

S1.name: State Certification
S1.description: Certified input state artifact (Psi_N) hashing and commitment.

S2.name: Cost Modeling
S2.description: Execution of S02 Cost/Failure Profile Assessment.

S4.name: Stability Veto Gate
S4.description: Stability Analysis and Dynamic Range Check.

S4_5.name: Context Attestation
S4_5.description: Validation of external and environmental context parameters.

S6_5.name: Behavioral Divergence Veto
S6_5.description: Check against known divergence signatures and anomalous behavior.

S8.name: Axiom Execution (P-01)
S8.description: GAX computes P-01 decision (Utility > Cost + Epsilon).

S9.name: NRALS Logging
S9.description: SGS records the transition outcome in the Non-Repudiable Audit Log System (NRALS).

S10.name: GICM Finalization
S10.description: CRoT signs the Governance Inter-Agent Commitment Manifest (GICM).

S11.name: State Commit
S11.description: Commitment of the next state artifact (Psi_N+1) prior to execution.
